mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REG_DT DESC) RNUM, ITEM_NO, NAME, PRICE, DETAIL, MAIN_IMG, SALES, REG_DT, MOD_DT, C_CATEGORY_ID FROM ITEM ) A WHERE A.RNUM <= 8 ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PRICE) RNUM, ITEM_NO, NAME, PRICE, DETAIL, MAIN_IMG, SALES, REG_DT, MOD_DT, C_CATEGORY_ID FROM ITEM ) A WHERE A.RNUM <= 8

SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT ORD.ITEM_NO,I.NAME, I.PRICE, I.MAIN_IMG, SUM(ORD.QUANTITY) AS SUM_QUANTITY FROM ORDERITEM ORD, ITEM I WHERE ORD.ITEM_NO=I.ITEM_NO GROUP BY ORD.ITEM_NO, I.NAME, I.PRICE, I.MAIN_IMG ORDER BY SUM_QUANTITY DESC )A WHERE ROWNUM <=8
